mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Treadwell, Thomas J. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Treadwell, Thomas J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 10 1861. By Telegraph from Philadelphia 10 1861. The price paid contracts for cavalry equipment includes the articles you name is twenty seven 27 dollars & a half 1/2 TJ Treadwell 1. Lt of ord 19W53 &86Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Treadwell, Thomas J.
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
